job.title: LAMP / .net Framework  Developer
job.description:
Looking for a LAMP Expert and a Window .NET framework expert to help on a long term contracting basis remotely which can troubleshoot issues. Our environment is a crossbreed between Linux Ubuntu servers and Window servers with the windows servers running custom written programs running on .net framework.
 
CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR:
On our windows boxes which have certain custom built applications on the .net framework, we would like someone to review the custom applications and help update the code as needed and migrate them to a new windows server 2022 box. 

For these custom applications running on window servers to be migrated, there are  connections to Ubuntu boxes that need to be reviewed and that’s where your LAMP skillset would come into play.

If you are well versed in .net framework and as a LAMP expert, and if you are looking for a long term gig, this position would be ideal for you.
 
I
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MUST HAVE:
•	HTML / .NET Framework
•	CSS 3.0
•	JavaScript
•	Mobile first design
•	Linux
•	Apache
•	PHP
•	MySQL
•	Stored Procedures
•	GIT, SVN or other version control system
•	Familiarity debugging and repairing existing and aging software
•	UI/UX design
•	Ability to gather requirements and translate those requirements into functional software


Nice to haves
•	Experience with Single Page Applications (Angular, React)
•	Experience launching production software applications and knowledge of the Software Development Lifecycle.
•	Experience with test Driven development
•	Writing both unit and functional tests
•	Be able to write clear concise design documents

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects
What frameworks have you worked with?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced developer to join our team for a long-term project of more than 6 months. The ideal candidate should have expertise in both LAMP and .NET Framework. Proficiency in PHP is also required.

As a part of this project, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using the LAMP stack and .NET Framework. Your role will involve collaborating with the team to design, develop, and test software solutions. The ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues is crucial.

To be considered for this position, please submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to the success of this project. Additionally, we request that you include links to any relevant completed projects that highlight your skills in LAMP, .NET Framework, and PHP development.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate to join our team.
